duties_responsibilities.duty: Implement and maintain secure computer networks to protect against cyber threats and unauthorized access.
Lead and guide a team in developing and implementing network security strategies and protocols.
Analyze network traffic and security logs to identify potential security breaches and vulnerabilities.
Collaborate with stakeholders to assess security risks and develop risk management strategies.
Conduct regular security assessments and audits to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations.
Provide technical support and assistance in resolving network security incidents and issues.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Networking, Network Security, or a related field (Preferred: degree in Engineering or Computer Sciences)
